title: Character
description: An exported character object from Optolith. Properties that are intended for external use only and thus are ignored when imported by Optolith are marked as read-only.

version.title: Optolith Version
version.description: A valid semantic version (https://semver.org), representing the Optolith version this character was created with.
version.$comment: The pattern is the recommended regex for semantic versioning: https://semver.org/#is-there-a-suggested-regular-expression-regex-to-check-a-semver-string.

date_created.title: Date of Creation
date_created.description: Date of character creation, in ISO8601 format.

date_last_modified.title: Date of Last Modification
date_last_modified.description: Date of character last modified, in ISO8601 format.

adventure_points.title: Adventure Points
adventure_points.description: An object storing all kinds of basic and calculated adventure points.

spent_on_magical_advantages.description: Adventure points spent on magical advantages.

spent_on_blessed_advantages.description: Adventure points spent on blessed advantages.

spent_on_magical_disadvantages.description: Adventure points spent on magical disadvantages.

spent_on_blessed_disadvantages.description: Adventure points spent on blessed disadvantages.

spent_on_combat_techniques.description: Adventure points spent on combat techniques.

spent_on_spells.description: Adventure points spent on spells, rituals and its enhancements.

spent_on_magical_actions.description: Adventure points spent on all kinds of magical actions.

spent_on_liturgical_chants.description: Adventure points spent on liturgical chant, ceremonies and its enhancements.

spent_on_special_abilities.description: Adventure points spent on all kinds of special abilities.

spent_on_energies.description: Adventure points spent on adding and buying back energy points.

experience_level.title: Experience Level Settings
experience_level.description: An object storing the identifiers of the experience level the character started at and the current experience level, derived from total adventure points.

is_character_creation_finished.title: Character Creation Finished
is_character_creation_finished.description: Describes whether the character creation is finished.

race.title: Race Settings
race.description: An object storing the identifiers of the race and its optional race variant.

selected_attribute_adjustment_id.description: The identifier of the attribute adjustment that has been selected from the race.

culture.title: Culture Settings
culture.description: An object storing the identifier of the culture and if the cultural package has been applied.

is_cultural_package_applied.description: Describes whether the cultural package has been applied when creating the character.

profession.title: Profession Settings
profession.description: An object storing the identifiers of the profession, its instance and its optional race variant.

instance_id.description: The profession instance identifier. Profession instances are versions of the same profession but slightly different values, such as in extension rule books existing professions might get an additional style special ability.

custom_name.description: A custom name for the profession, if provided.

curriculum.title: Curriculum Settings
curriculum.description: An object storing the identifiers of the profession, its instance and its optional race variant.

rules.title: Rules Settings
rules.description: The rules settings for the character.

include_all_publications.description: Whether the character makes use of all publications except for publications with adult content, which have to be specified explicitly using "include_publications".

include_publications.description: Explicitly used publications. If "include_all_publications" is set to "true", only affects publications that are not covered by "include_all_publications".

options.description: An array of one or more options. The exact meaning of each option varies based on the optional rule.

personal_data.title: Personal Data
personal_data.description: Personal data such as hair color and place of birth.

sex.description: The character's sex. It does not have to be binary, although it always must be specified how to handle it in the context of binary sex prerequisites. You can also provide a custom sex with a custom name.

binary_handling.description: How the sex should be handled in the context of a binary sex prerequisite.

as_male.description: Defines if the sex should be treated as male when checking prerequisites.

as_female.description: Defines if the sex should be treated as female when checking prerequisites.

binary_handling.description: How the sex should be handled in the context of a binary sex prerequisite.

as_male.description: Defines if the sex should be treated as male when checking prerequisites.

as_female.description: Defines if the sex should be treated as female when checking prerequisites.

family.description: The family names and/or family members.

place_of_birth.description: The place where the character was born.

date_of_birth.description: The date when the character was born.

hair_color.description: The hair color of the character.

eye_color.description: The eye color of the character.

special_abilities.title: Special Abilities
special_abilities.description: Lists of active special abilities, by group.

attributes.title: Attributes
attributes.description: A list of attributes with values above 8. Attributes that are not listed here default to 8.

derived_characteristics.title: Derived Characteristics
derived_characteristics.description: Computed, set and bought values for/of derived characteristics.

modifier.description: The life points modifier depending on relevant advantages, disadvantages and special abilities.

purchased.description: The number of life points purchased.

permanently_lost.description: The number of life points permanently lost.

arcane_energy.title: Arcane Energy
arcane_energy.description: This property does not exist if the character does not have the active advantage Spellcaster and an active magical tradition special ability.

modifier.description: The arcane energy modifier depending on relevant advantages, disadvantages and special abilities.

purchased.description: The number of arcane energy points purchased.

permanently_lost.description: The number of arcane energy points permanently lost.

permanently_lost_bought_back.description: The number of permanently lost arcane energy points that have been bought back.

karma_points.title: Karma Points
karma_points.description: This property does not exist if the character does not have the active advantage Blessed One and an active blessed tradition special ability.

modifier.description: The karma points modifier depending on relevant advantages, disadvantages and special abilities.

purchased.description: The number of karma points points purchased.

permanently_lost.description: The number of karma points points permanently lost.

permanently_lost_bought_back.description: The number of permanently lost karma points points that have been bought back.

modifier.description: The spirit modifier depending on relevant advantages, disadvantages and special abilities.
The toughness modifier depending on relevant advantages, disadvantages and special abilities.
The dodge modifier depending on relevant advantages, disadvantages and special abilities.
The initiative modifier depending on relevant advantages, disadvantages and special abilities.
The movement modifier depending on relevant advantages, disadvantages and special abilities.

wound_threshold.title: Wound Threshold
wound_threshold.description: This property is not present if the required focus rules are not activated.

modifier.description: The wound threshold modifier depending on relevant advantages, disadvantages and special abilities.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: A list of skills with values above 0. Skills that are not listed here default to 0.

combat_techniques.title: Combat Techniques
combat_techniques.description: Lists of combat techniques, by group.

melee.title: Melee Combat Techniques
melee.description: A list of melee combat techniques with values above 6. Combat techniques that are not listed here default to 6.

ranged.title: Ranged Combat Techniques
ranged.description: A list of ranged combat techniques with values above 6. Combat techniques that are not listed here default to 6.

magical_actions.title: Magical Actions
magical_actions.description: Lists of magical actions, by group.

elven_magical_songs.title: Elven Magical Songs
elven_magical_songs.description: A list of active Elven magical songs.

domination_rituals.title: Domination Rituals
domination_rituals.description: A list of active domination rituals.

magical_dances.title: Magical Dances
magical_dances.description: A list of active magical dances.

magical_melodies.title: Magical Melodies
magical_melodies.description: A list of active magical melodies.

jester_tricks.title: Jester Tricks
jester_tricks.description: A list of active jester tricks.

animist_powers.title: Animist Powers
animist_powers.description: A list of active animist powers.

geode_rituals.title: Geode Rituals
geode_rituals.description: A list of active geode rituals.

zibilja_rituals.title: Zibilja Rituals
zibilja_rituals.description: A list of active zibilja rituals.

liturgical_chants.title: Liturgical Chants
liturgical_chants.description: A list of active liturgical chants.

Activatables.title: Activatables
Activatables.description: A list of active activatables. Activatables are advantages, disadvantages and special abilities.

instances.description: One or multiple activations of the activatable.

items.description: A single activation of the activatable.

options.description: One or multiple options for the activatable. The meaning depends on the activatable.

oneOf.description: An identifier referencing a different entry.

type.description: The entry type or "Generic" if it references a local select option.

level.description: The instance level (if the activatable has levels).

custom_ap_value.description: If provided, a custom adventure points value has been set for this instance.
